name: Museu Oscar Niemeyer
address: R. Mal. Hermes, 999 - Centro Cívico, Curitiba - PR
description: One of the largest art museums in Latin America.

name: Jardim Botânico
address: Av. Pref. Lothário Meissner, 3168 - Jardim Botânico, Curitiba - PR
description: Famous for its beautiful glass greenhouse and gardens.

name: Parque Tanguá
address: R. Oswaldo Maciel, 97 - Taboão, Curitiba - PR
description: Known for its stunning sunset view and waterfalls.

name: Rua das Flores
address: Rua XV de Novembro - Centro, Curitiba - PR
description: A charming pedestrian-only street with shops and cafés.

name: Bosque Alemão
address: Rua Franz Schubert, 120 - Vista Alegre, Curitiba - PR
description: Features a Hansel & Gretel trail and German architecture.

name: Torre Panorâmica
address: Rua Prof. Lycio Grein de Castro Vellozo, 191 - Mercês, Curitiba - PR
description: Offers a 360° view of the entire city.

name: Feirinha do Largo da Ordem
address: Largo da Ordem - Centro Histórico, Curitiba - PR
description: A traditional street fair with artisans and local food.

name: Teatro Paiol
address: Praça Guido Viaro, s/n - Prado Velho, Curitiba - PR
description: An old gunpowder storage converted into a theater.
